attributes.review: The second I opened this app it glitched uncontrollably and then when I went to my other apps they all started to glitch too!! My music randomly started playing and my flash kept going on, my phone started taking random pictures and I was being sent nonstop notifications from the app to the point where I couldnâ€™t even use my phone!! Only within 5 minutes of downloading the app I had to delete it, not only because of the problems I listed but I was getting security alerts regarding all my personal information as if it was hacking into everything!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!!!
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE

attributes.userName: this one is for the boys with-
attributes.review: Honestly, as an incredibly loyal supporter of cheetos, I expected this app to be better and worthy of my time. But I was incredibly disappointed the second I opened the app to see my phone number being requested. Also, after opening the app, I began to notice my phone glitching, and I would not stop getting notifications. My phone also began to run very slow, which is unusual. It was as though my cellular device was physically rejecting the essence of our prestigious overlord cheeto. Overall, I was incredibly disappointed in this app, and I honestly expected better from out amazing Orange Oompa Loompa in office.
attributes.title: very disappointing

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my cat who is a devoted follow of Trump. Upon download and installation, my cat was elated at the words â€œTrump 2020â€ for he originally planned to vote in Trumps favor come November. However, once the app was opened, a sight that no cat, or human for the matter, should see was casted into my cats memory for eternity. Now I cannot go into detail as to what was shown, for my cat watches me with fearful eyes, but letâ€™s just say that now at the sight of the MAGA acronym he clings to my leg just as Trumps toupee clings to his head on a windy afternoon. Please, for the sake of my cats mental state, remove this app so no more felines endure the trauma that is forever instilled within my cat.
attributes.title: Terrible Horrible No Good Very Bad App

attributes.review: I donâ€™t know if itâ€™s a glitch with the app but every night at 3am I start getting spammed with notifications that just say â€œeâ€. Also when I pass a school, playground, or daycare the app sends notifications with male moaning sounds??? I know in the app description it says it uses our location even if the app is closed but I have no idea why the locations of these places are so significant. Iâ€™m actually kinda worried why it only recognizes the location with large amounts of children present. Iâ€™ve tried turning off my ringer,  notifications, and location for the app but it just keeps happening.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: Horrible app! I got into the app and it immediately started playing replay. When I tried to get off the app Donald trump appeared on my screen and said that Iâ€™m not allowed to leave and will be trapped in a wall. He then calls my mom and says I need to be put in time out so then she threw me in a closet. Donald then is in my closet and says I found you, you dirty stinky rat and then throws his hair at me. I asked him why he did this and he said that the app told him to! Afterwards he told everyone to leave the house then he blew it up! He said the app made him do it. I hate this app! It ruined my life. Now I have to make chicken toes on the nasty streetğŸ˜¤
attributes.title: Waste of space

attributes.review: Ok so I was shaving my thumb hair & this app started sending me text saying how it would tickle my brothers toes in his sleep if I didnâ€™t pay my pillow pets doctor the $40,000 I owe him for the c-section I was like woah wait I gave my toothbrush a bowling birthday party for his 23 birthday 4 years ago why are you so pressed but then I was walking me turkey down the jet wing & we fell I asked the app to catch us at the bottom but he was saying that he couldnâ€™t do it he had to go to his sisters best friends half brothers uncles 2nd gotcha day dinosaur hot air ballon celebration so thatâ€™s how I lost my first finger on my momâ€™s brothers wedding anniversary & itâ€™s all thanks to this stupid app...
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I donâ€™t usually leave reviews but.... I just felt the need to come on here and explain how much this app has ruined my day. Both of my grandparents had surgery last week and I drive 30 minutes to their house every day to help them cook and clean because theyâ€™re not mobile. The Trump 2020 app constantly opens randomly and starts playing the USSR national Anthem which is VERY offensive to my grandfather who served for the United States during the Cold War. Iâ€™m disgusted that an app thatâ€™s supposed to support the people would constantly do something so horrifying. I am NOT satisfied and will not be using this app again.
attributes.title: Very very very Problematic

attributes.review:
The Entire Bee Movie Script

Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, g
